posts.post_text: July 17, 2014 at 11:21 PM#2I dont think there is an option to do this, what you could do is to make a layout view with a custom written text in it, save your show with that layout on screen, shut down console and when restarting the console the latest state of the console will be loaded, so your message should be seen, other option is to put a handwritten note at the desk
